description:
Program for comprehensive HARDY-WEINBERG equilibrium testing.

HW_TEST, a software developed for Microsoft Windows that can be managed without any difficulties by users with a minimum of programming skills and statistical/mathematical background, is a program that tests the null hypothesis of Hardy-Weinberg proportions using genotype data from autosomal genetic markers with two to twelve alleles.
name: HW_TEST

metadata.abstract: © 2020, Sociedade Brasileira de Genética.This article deals with a Windows (© Microsoft Inc.) executable, user-friendly program that tests the hypothesis of Hardy-Weinberg (HW) proportions from autosomal multiallelic data using different methods that include parametric, nonparametric and exact bootstrap tests, the latter obtained through computer simulations. The program can be obtained free of charge directly from the internet repository https://github.com/Lemes-RenanB/HardyWeinbergTesting.
metadata.title: Hw_test, a program for comprehensive hardy-weinberg equilibrium testing
